tasks.title: Complete Project Proposal
tasks.text: Write a detailed proposal for the new client project including timeline, budget, and resource requirements.

tasks.title: Buy Groceries
tasks.text: Get milk, eggs, bread, fruits, and vegetables from the supermarket. Don't forget to check for fresh produce.

tasks.title: Schedule Team Meeting
tasks.text: Organize weekly team sync-up to discuss project progress and address any blocking issues.

tasks.title: Learn TypeScript
tasks.text: Complete the TypeScript tutorial on the official website and practice with small projects.

tasks.title: Fix Navigation Bug
tasks.text: Debug and resolve the navigation issue in the mobile app's sidebar component.

tasks.title: Optimize Image Loading
tasks.text: Improve the image loading performance on the homepage to reduce latency.

tasks.title: Update User Profile UI
tasks.text: Redesign the user profile page for better user experience and consistency with the new theme.

tasks.title: Implement Dark Mode
tasks.text: Add support for dark mode across all app screens and ensure proper theme switching.

tasks.title: Fix Login Validation Bug
tasks.text: Resolve the issue where incorrect error messages are shown during login failures.

tasks.title: Add Multi-Language Support
tasks.text: Enable multi-language support in the app, starting with Spanish and French translations.
